short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome browser extension that provides the results of a coin toss (heads or tails). Randomisation is powered by quantum physics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that users can 'flip' a coin to receive a HEADS or TAILS answer based upon a random number generated by calling a Quantum Random Number Generator.
